purpleculture_pinyin:
diàn
pad; cushion; mat; to pad out; to fill a gap; to pay for sb; to advance (money)
колодка; подушка; мат; набивать; восполнить пробел; платить за сб; аванс (деньги)
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 垫)
Pictophonetic: 執 indicates the sound; 土 (earth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
墊付 [ diàn fù ]: to pay sb else's expense with the expectation of being reimbursed by that person later
墊子 [ diàn zi ]: cushion; mat; pad

heisig_chinese_memo: The coach gives the American football players a good fortune pill so they can win while away from their home soil. &nbsp
Ru_trainchinese:
diàn: (глаг/сущ) подкладывать, подстилать (чтобы сделать выше или выровнять); подушка, подстилка
diàn: (глаг) оплачивать авансом; подкладывать, подстилать; заполнять пространство, вставлять
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: American football players take steroid pills, where a lot of pads and clench the soil on the ground with their hands before each play begins.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " earth ", " hold " sound, the original meaning is sinking. "Shuowen": "Xia Ye. "Chunqiu Biography" says: Dianai. From the soil, hold the voice."

" Pad " can mean excavation. "Zhuangzi‧ Foreign Objects": "But if the toilet is full and cushioned, to Huangquan, people are still useful?" Cheng Xuanying said: "Cushion, dig."

" Pad " also means sagging. Cao Cao of the Three Kingdoms: "The Generals of the Three Armies": "The generals of the three armies, whose flags are like rain, are like dew from heaven."

" Pad " in modern Chinese also means to use other things to line the bottom to make things taller, thicker, or separate. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 19: "Sit down with Baoyu's support, and put his feet on the stove."

" Dian " also means to pay for someone temporarily. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 51: "Adults are big-handed and don't know how much they have paid for their wives."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " earth " and " holding ", the original meaning is sinking.
humanum_full_description:
從「土」，「執」聲，本義為下陷。《說文》：「下也。《春秋傳》曰：墊隘。从土，執聲。」

　　「墊」可表示挖掘。《莊子‧外物》：「然則廁足而墊之，致黃泉，人尚有用乎？」成玄英疏：「墊，掘也。」

　　「墊」也表示下垂。三國魏曹操《兵書接要》：「三軍將行，其旗墊然若雨，是謂天露。」

　　「墊」在近現代漢語中還表示用別的東西襯在下面，使物加高、加厚或起隔離作用。《紅樓夢》第19回：「扶着寶玉坐下，又用自己的腳爐墊了腳。」

　　「墊」還表示暫時替人付錢。《紅樓夢》第51回：「成年家大手大腳的，替太太不知背地裏賠墊了多少東西。」

從「 土 」，「 執 」聲，本義為下陷。《說文》：「下也。《春秋傳》曰：墊隘。从土，執聲。」 「 墊 」可表示挖掘。《莊子‧外物》：「然則廁足而墊之，致黃泉，人尚有用乎？」成玄英疏：「墊，掘也。」 「 墊 」也表示下垂。三國魏曹操《兵書接要》：「三軍將行，其旗墊然若雨，是謂天露。」 「 墊 」在近現代漢語中還表示用別的東西襯在下面，使物加高、加厚或起隔離作用。《紅樓夢》第19回：「扶着寶玉坐下，又用自己的腳爐墊了腳。」 「 墊 」還表示暫時替人付錢。《紅樓夢》第51回：「成年家大手大腳的，替太太不知背地裏賠墊了多少東西。」
From " earth", " hold" sound, the original meaning is sinking. "Shuowen": "Xia Ye. "Chunqiu Biography" says: Dianai. From the soil, hold the voice." " Pad" can mean excavation. "Zhuangzi‧ Foreign Objects": "But if the toilet is full and cushioned, to Huangquan, people are still useful?" Cheng Xuanying said: "Cushion, dig." " Pad" also means sagging. Cao Cao of the Three Kingdoms: "The Generals of the Three Armies": "The generals of the three armies, whose flags are like rain, are like dew from heaven." " Pad" in modern Chinese also means to use other things to line the bottom to make things taller, thicker, or separate. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 19: "Sit down with Baoyu's support, and put his feet on the stove." " Dian" also means to pay for someone temporarily. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 51: "Adults are big-handed and don't know how much they have paid for their wives."

墊字的基本解释

墊
diàn
见“垫”。

墊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［diàn］
［《廣韻》都念切，去，端。］
“垫1”的繁体字。
(1)陷没；下陷。
(2)下垂。
(3)下湿病。
(4)挖掘。
(5)去除，不计在内。
(6)埋藏。参见“墊財”。
(7)犹收买。
(8)填补空缺。
(9)用别的东西衬在下面，使物加高、加厚或起隔离作用。
(10)垫子。
(11)暂时替人付钱。
(12)指触着凸起的硬东西而受到损伤。
(13)用皮子做的衬在扳指内侧的东西。
(14)排球运动中接球的一种动作。
[②]［dié］
［《廣韻》徒協切，入帖，定。］
“垫2”的繁体字。
(1)垫江，古县名。在今四川省合川县。
(2)垫江，今县名。在四川省

pad
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［diàn］
["Guangyun" all read and cut, go to , end. ]
Traditional characters for "垫1".
(1) Sinking; sinking.
(2) Drooping.
(3) Lower dampness disease.
(4) Excavation.
(5) Excluded, not counted.
(6) Buried. See "Dian Cai".
(7) Still buying.
(8) Fill vacancies.
(9) Use other things to line the bottom to heighten, thicken or isolate the object.
(10) Mat.
(11) Temporarily pay for people.
(12) The finger is damaged by touching a raised hard object.
(13) Something made of leather to line the inside of the finger.
(14) An act of catching a ball in volleyball.
[②]［dié］
["Guangyun" Apprentice Xie cut, enter the post, set. ]
Traditional characters for "垫2".
(1) Dianjiang, the name of the ancient county. In today's Hechuan County, Sichuan Province.
(2) Dianjiang, the name of this county. In sichuan province
